NULL
Restroom break.
Available
Activity used internally to automatically merge time records
Special Projects, used when an agent is helping with off the phone activities.  Log Out code

Supervisor Meeting/Coaching
Time spent speaking with a customer
Used when new attendance policy implemented, 09/05/06.  Lates prior to 09/05/06 were recorded under the exception "Late".
Tech Problems, Not Ready code used when an agent needs to call the help desk or has other Tech issues with their PC or Phone
Tech Problems, Log out code used when an agent needs to call the help desk or has other Tech issues with their PC or Phone
Approved Military Service Duty enactment.  Must provide Human Resources without appropriate documentation.
Approved Leave of Absence through Human Resources or Senior Operations.  Medical Leave - Employees who have been preapproved for an extended leave based on medical reasons (i.e. non-FMLA Maternity)
Jury Duty, approved Jury Duty.  Requires documentation to Supervisor prior to coding this a Jury Duty.
Voluntary Timeoff
No Call/No Show- Agent does not arrive at work and does not notify the correct parties.  Job Adandonment- Agent leaves shift without notifying correct parties.
FMLA, only approved FMLA from HR should be recorded in this exception.  Email FMLA totals weekly to HR for reconciliation.  This encompasses Maternity Leave and other approved absences

Call in to report absence for any reason, only effective on a predetermined Critical Attendance day.  This code is to be used when an agent contacts the appropriate parties and notifies them of an abs
Scheduled Vacation, or Paid Time Off (PTO)
Leave Without Pay, approved by Operations (LWOP)
Used when an agent is absent greater than half of their scheduled shift
Awaiting approval for FMLA
Call in to report absence for any reason.  This code is to be used when an agent contacts the appropriate parties and notifies them of an absence. (in affect 0:30 start of shift to the EOS/OT)
Bereavement, used when an agent is approved to be absent due to a family bereavement per the current attendance policy
Used when new attendance policy implemented, 09/05/06.  Lates prior to 09/05/06 were recorded under the exception "Late".
